users_groups.warning_provider: To change the Account provider, the current provider has to be removed
users_groups.name: Nume
users_groups.description_provider: Users and groups are available through an account provider. You can connect this server to a remote account provider, or install a local one. Some features may be available depending on the account provider.
users_groups.description_provider_2: Ușor de configurat, nu oferă suport pentru acces autentificat la directoarele partajate
users_groups.description_provider_3: Activează toate caracteristicile directoarelor partajate; necesită opțiuni avansate de configurare
users_groups.description_provider_4: Download and configure OpenLDAP server as a local LDAP account provider
users_groups.ldap_description: O bază de date LDAP poate stoca utilizatori, grupuri și parole. Este necesară o schema LDAP compatibilă RFC2307.
users_groups.dc_description: Calculatoarele dintr-un domeniu Active Directory pot fi simpli membri sau controller-e de domeniu (DC)
users_groups.ip_warning_message_1: The chosen IP address must satisfy all of the following conditions
users_groups.ip_warning_message_2: The IP address must be in the same subnet range of a green network: e.g.
users_groups.ip_warning_message_3: The IP address must be unused currently
users_groups.define_authorization_description: Select views and applications that members of this group can view. Make sure delegated users have the "Shell" option enabled
users_groups.auth_required: Bind credentials are required for external applications
users_groups.auth_credentials: Date de conectare pentru aplicații LDAP
users_groups.no_users_found_desc: If your provider is local, click on button below to create a new user or add it on remote provider
users_groups.no_groups_found_desc: If your provider is local, click on button below to create a new group or add it on remote provider

software_center.nethserver_upgrade_message:
A system upgrade for NethServer is available. 
The system upgrade procedure enables the new version repositories and updates any installed package

subscription.title: Abonament
subscription.registration_description: Abonamentul Nethserver al Nethesis activează accesul exclusiv la depozitele cu actualizări stabile, instrumente de monitorizare și servicii de suport profesionale imediate pentru instalările tale Nethserver. Îți permite să implementezi, să monitorizezi și să gestionezi instanțele tale NethServer, completând resursele tale IT și sporind eficiența și fiabilitatea serviciilor tale
subscription.registration_description_2: Do you already have an authorization token? Copy and paste it in the field below
subscription.registration_description_ent: Register the server to access software repositories, support services and enable monitoring tools
subscription.registration_description_2_ent: Do you already have an authorization token? Copy and paste it in the field below
subscription.registration_description_ent_partial: This machine has been registered successfully, but to unlock additional functionalities insert the authorization token
subscription.registration_description_2_ent_partial: You can find the authorization token in the server detail page in the cloud portal
subscription.remove_subscription_warn: This action will disconnect this system from the cloud portal
subscription.remove_subscription_warn_ent: This action will disconnect this system from the cloud portal

hints.support_active: O sesiune de suport de la distanță este activă

docs.sftp_password: The password will not be saved. SSH connection will use a RSA key.

docs.limit_access: Restict access to port 9090 only to given IP addresses
